node.text: If the young readers in your life are taking part in #HarryPotterReadingMagic we have this great 'Marble House Point Jars' DIY. Take part in weekly chapter challenges and earn house points. See how many they can earn as we explore the first book. Head to the link in our bio to find this week's chapter challenge

node.title: Wizarding World | Marble House Point Jars

node.text:
Each week for #HarryPotterReadingMagic we'll be listening to some of the extracts from the first book read by Stephen Fry. For week one we've chosen this conversation between Dumbledore and McGonagall. 

Until July 31st, listen to Harry Potter and the Philosopher's/Sorcerer's Stone for free with Alexa, just say 'Alexa, read Harry Potter Book One'

node.title: Harry Potter Reading Magic | Week One

node.text:
"The Patronus is a kind of positive force..." Light up your home with our DIY Patronus light, which creature are you picking?

For templates head to wizarding.world/patronus-templates

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on September 17, 2021.

node.text: Do you remember which bricks you need to tap to access Diagon Alley? Test your knowledge of the wizarding shopping district by heading to the link in our bio

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on September 16, 2021. May be an image of 6 people, people standing and indoor.

node.text: The Sorting Hat may have asked you not to judge it, but we're (only slightly) judging your Sorting Hat knowledge today! Put on your thinking caps and try our latest quiz by heading to the link in our bio

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on September 16, 2021. May be an image of 2 people, people standing and snow.

node.text: Hogsmeade or Diagon Alley, where would you prefer to venture? Are you drinking Butterbeer at the Three Broomsticks or cooling down with ice cream at Florean Fortescue's? See what we think by heading to the link in our bio

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on September 15, 2021. May be an image of 1 person.

node.text: Award-winning actor Dame Helen Mirren is joining the Wizarding World family to host an exciting four-part quiz competition, Harry Potter: Hogwarts Tournament of Houses. Discover more by heading to the link in our bio #HPTournamentOfHouses

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on September 14, 2021. May be an image of 2 people.

node.text: We, like many of you, have imagined what it would be like to be friends with the Marauders, but what if you were one of them? Head to the link in our bio to find out which Marauder you're most like, and we promise not to judge if it's Wormtail!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on September 14, 2021. May be an image of 4 people and indoor.

node.text: After Harry stops the snake that Draco conjures, there are rumours that Harry may be related to Salazar Slytherin himself. If you can cast your mind back to the first time you read or watched the 2nd story did you ever think he was?

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on September 13, 2021. May be an image of 3 people and indoor.

node.text: The golden trio are fan faves but just how well do you know Harry, Ron and Hermione? Test yourself in our rather difficult golden trio quiz by heading to the link in our bio

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on September 09, 2021. May be an image of text.

node.text:
A serpent isn't only the emblem of house Slytherin, snakes are weaved throughout the stories. From Basilisks to Nagini how much do you know about snakes in the wizarding world? Head to the link in our bio to take our quiz then let us know your sssscore
http://wizarding.world/6179yFich

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on September 09, 2021. May be an image of ‎book and ‎text that says '‎4 ه HARRY POTTER J.K.RO HARRY J.K RO J.K. ROWI ARRYS ARRY Hary SORCERERSST Potter‎'‎‎.

node.text:
Young readers can delve into the magic of Harry Potter’s wizarding world with the newly launched @jkrowling_stories. Explore a new interactive section on J.K. Rowling’s website covering Harry Potter and the author's other imaginary worlds of children’s fiction.

Head to the link in our bio to explore with young readers now

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on September 07, 2021. May be an image of 1 person and indoor.

node.text: Throughout the books and films, we see characters develop and change. Which character did your opinion of change the most by the end? Let us know in the comments

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on September 03, 2021. May be an image of 1 person and indoor.

node.text:
Whilst many traits may separate the houses, in the Harry Potter Fan Club there are just as many similarities! All four houses selected Butterbeer as their favourite drink and Expecto Patronum as their top spell. 

Head to the link in our bio to select your passport favourites

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on September 03, 2021. May be an image of one or more people, train and railroad.

node.text:
Did you know in the first film the platform nine and three-quarters scenes were filmed at the real King's Cross station? The crew discovered that the space between platforms 4 and 5 was the perfect spot! #20YearsOfMovieMagic 

📷 Philosopher's Stone
